framework.components.JSContainer

public class JSForm
extends JSContainer
Renders a form tag with

Kureem Rossaye

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String[] advancedEventTypes()
    returns an array of advanced specific supported event listener
    beforeValidate - Fired before validating the form afterValidate - Fired after the form is validated beforeSetData - Fired before setting data into the input fields of the form afterSetData - Fired after setting data into the input fields of the form beforeGetData - Fired before retrieving data from the input fields of the form afterGetData - Fired after retrieving data from the input fields of the form onError - Fired if there is one or more errors after validating the form beforeSubmit - Fired before submitting the form afterSubmit - Fired after submitting the form even if the form is not valid submit - Fired on submitting the form and if there is no error after validation reset - Fired when the form is reset
    jsweet.lang.Object getData()
    Retrieves data from all the fields in this form
    The following chain of event is fired when this method is called:
    beforeGetData afterGetData
    ValidationException getError​(java.lang.String binding)  
    jsweet.lang.Object getErrors()  
    InputField<?> getField​(java.lang.String binding)  
    boolean hasErrors()
    Returns whether this form has errors or not after validating it
    If the form has not been validated yet, this method will return false
    boolean isValid()
    Return whether the form is valid of not after validating it.
    If the form has not been validated yet, this method will return true
    void reset()
    Resets the form by clearing all the fields in the form
    This method is called automatically when the form is reset for example by clicking an input of type reset present in the form
    or by resetting it using javascript means.
    The reset event is fired when this method is called
    void setData​(jsweet.lang.Object data)
    Injects data into the fields of the form.
    each property of the form should be the binding of the input field
    If for a field in the form, corresponding property is not found in the specified data, the field will be cleared and its value set to null
    The following chain of event is fired when this method is called:
    beforeSetData afterSetData
    void submit()
    Submits the form.
    This method is called automatically when the form is submitted for example by clicking an input of type submit present in the form or by submitting the form using javascript.
    When this method is called, the form is validated, then the getData method is called.
    The following chain of event is fired when this method is called beforeSubmit event is fired validate method is called beforeValidate event is fired onError event is fired only if there is any error in the form afterValidate event is fired if form is valid, getData method is called beforeGetData event is fired afterGetData event is fired if form is valid submit event is fired Whether or not form is valid, afterSubmit event is fired
    boolean validate()
    Validates all fields in this form and returns whether there is any error in the form
    The following chain of event will be fired when this method is called:
    beforeValidate onError - only if there is any error in the form afterValidate

  • Constructor Details

    • JSForm

      public JSForm​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new instance of form with the specified name
      Parameters:
      name - - The name of the form

  • Method Details

    • advancedEventTypes

      public java.lang.String[] advancedEventTypes()
      returns an array of advanced specific supported event listener
      • beforeValidate - Fired before validating the form
      • afterValidate - Fired after the form is validated
      • beforeSetData - Fired before setting data into the input fields of the form
      • afterSetData - Fired after setting data into the input fields of the form
      • beforeGetData - Fired before retrieving data from the input fields of the form
      • afterGetData - Fired after retrieving data from the input fields of the form
      • onError - Fired if there is one or more errors after validating the form
      • beforeSubmit - Fired before submitting the form
      • afterSubmit - Fired after submitting the form even if the form is not valid
      • submit - Fired on submitting the form and if there is no error after validation
      • reset - Fired when the form is reset
      Overrides:
      advancedEventTypes in class JSContainer
      Returns:
      An array of custom events supported by the component
      This method is overridden by more complex components to provide more advanced events mechanisms.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Return whether the form is valid of not after validating it.
      If the form has not been validated yet, this method will return true
      Returns:
      - Whether the form is valid or not

    • hasErrors

      public boolean hasErrors()
      Returns whether this form has errors or not after validating it
      If the form has not been validated yet, this method will return false
      Returns:
      - Whether this form has errors or not

    • getError

      public ValidationException getError​(java.lang.String binding)
      Parameters:
      binding - - The name or binding of the input element in the form
      Returns:
      - The validation exception if any for the specified binding of the form element

    • getErrors

      public jsweet.lang.Object getErrors()
      Returns:
      - All errors found after validating this form

    • getField

      public InputField<?> getField​(java.lang.String binding)
      Parameters:
      binding - - The binding or name of the input field to search for
      Returns:
      - The input field having specified name or binding

    • validate

      public boolean validate()
      Validates all fields in this form and returns whether there is any error in the form
      The following chain of event will be fired when this method is called:
      • beforeValidate
      • onError - only if there is any error in the form
      • afterValidate
      Returns:
      - Whether there is any error in the form

    • setData

      public void setData​(jsweet.lang.Object data)
      Injects data into the fields of the form.
      each property of the form should be the binding of the input field
      If for a field in the form, corresponding property is not found in the specified data, the field will be cleared and its value set to null
      The following chain of event is fired when this method is called:
      • beforeSetData
      • afterSetData
      Parameters:
      data - - The data to inject into the form

    • getData

      public jsweet.lang.Object getData()
      Retrieves data from all the fields in this form
      The following chain of event is fired when this method is called:
      • beforeGetData
      • afterGetData
      Returns:
      - The data from all the fields in the form

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the form by clearing all the fields in the form
      This method is called automatically when the form is reset for example by clicking an input of type reset present in the form
      or by resetting it using javascript means.
      The reset event is fired when this method is called

    • submit

      public void submit()
      Submits the form.
      This method is called automatically when the form is submitted for example by clicking an input of type submit present in the form or by submitting the form using javascript.
      When this method is called, the form is validated, then the getData method is called.
      The following chain of event is fired when this method is called
      • beforeSubmit event is fired
      • validate method is called
        • beforeValidate event is fired
        • onError event is fired only if there is any error in the form
        • afterValidate event is fired
      • if form is valid, getData method is called
        • beforeGetData event is fired
        • afterGetData event is fired
      • if form is valid submit event is fired
      • Whether or not form is valid, afterSubmit event is fired
